**Government Tender Announcement: Inmate Paid Television Services**
===========================================================

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01004874
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Extension of Tender Closing Date**: No extension available
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-08T12:00:00
**Publication Date**: 2022-08-19
**Amendment Date**: 2022-08-31
-------------------------------------------------------

**Summary of Tender**
---------------------

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites proposals from interested suppliers to provide Inmate Paid Television Services at Drumheller Institution, located in Alberta. 

**Background and Objectives**
---------------------------

Drumheller Institution, a federal corrections institution, houses approximately 650 inmates. The objective of this requirement is to provide a viable and balanced CATV signal or equivalent throughout the institution to up to 650 outlets.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The supplier will be responsible for providing a minimum of 60 channels, including basic channels, three movie channels, and 10 a la carte channels. The supplier must also provide service personnel available 24/7 for maintenance and repair. 

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

* Supplier must respond to service calls within one hour of receiving notification.
* Supplier must arrive on site within four hours for a full-scale outage and 24 hours for service calls other than a full-scale outage.
* Supplier must test the all-in-one head end system and signal strength twice per year, per site, and report the results to the CSC.
* Supplier must provide a credit to the affected site on the detainee's TV account in the event of a full-scale outage lasting longer than 48 consecutive hours.

**Contract Duration**
--------------------

The contract will be effective from October 1, 2022, to September 30, 2027.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------------------------

All interested suppliers can submit a proposal. The evaluation criteria will be based on the suppliers' ability to meet the tender requirements.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

For further information and to view solicitation documents, please visit [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders). If you have any questions, please contact Jill Pelrine at [501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca). 

**Language**
------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
